channel.title: Compiling error i got while fixing pickup command

item.title: Compiling error i got while fixing pickup command
item.dc:creator: @aplwanabes aplwanabes
item.description:
@aplwanabes wrote:

client.java:11862: ‘try’ without ‘catch’ or ‘finally’
try {
^
Well i got this trying to make it so everybody could pickup on my server this is the pickup code i have.

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error i got while fixing pickup command
